body.p: It was a bright summer morning, and Mother Duck sat proudly on her nest by the edge of the serene pond. She had been waiting what felt like forever for her eggs to hatch, and today was finally the day.

One by one, the eggs cracked open, and out came the fluffy yellow ducklings, all chirping excitedly. But as the mother duck counted her babies, she noticed that one didnâ€™t quite look like the rest. This duckling was larger, with gray feathers and a long neck.
Mother Duck loved all her ducklings equally, but her heart sank when she saw how the others quickly began to tease the strange-looking one.
